column3: “Smoked the first bowl and felt the effects of this little sativa almost instantly. Don't be fooled by its small popcorn bud, this thing packs a punch. Euphoric, uplifting and happy high. Would recommend to a friend.”
“was amazed by the high very soft and mellow for a sativa but very focused and happy. Great smell and taste would buy again for the above reasons”
“really smooth body high but doesn't make you feel heavy”
“best sativa i’ve ever smoked. i felt very focus and uplifted.”

“Top notch Sativa. 

The flavors and aromas of this bud are stellar
Picked up a full OZ of shake for this one after trying a pre roll. Still had incredible quality and flavor.

If you see it and you don’t get it you’re missing out.”
